actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of Jack L. Williams.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to hear, determine, and render judgment upon any claim of a named individual against the United States for damages allegedly resulting from lost promotional opportunities during a period of employment by the Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgment upon the claim of Jack L. Williams.
